page.title: 08QUESTIONARE RESULTS
page.content: Q1{427 PEOPLE Q2{SEMI-DETATCHED-42 FLAT -1 { DETATCHED -32 FARMHOUSE-1 {BUNGALOW -11 TOWNHOUSE-1 {TERRACED -12 Q3{907 ROOMS Q4{74 HAD CENTRAL HEATING,26 DID NOT Q5{DOGS-41 RABBITS-10 CATS-33 BIRDS-21 { FISH-36 Q6{CARS-118 (OVER 1 PER HOUSEHOLD) { VANS-9 } Q7{71 HOMES HAD A COMPUTER,29 DID NOT Q8{62 HOMES HAD A VIDEO,38 DID NOT Q9{47 HOMES HAD A MICROWAVE OVEN,53 { DID NOT} Q10{78 HOMES TOOK A DAILY {NEWSPAPER-POPULAR ONES WERE;THE SUN, {THE MIRROR,DAILY EXPRESS,THE GUARDIAN {AND THE LOCAL DAILY EVENING PAPER {CALLED THE EVENING POST. }
